ModMetaData.name: More Study Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
Adds 6 more study genes, a 25%, a 75%, a 117%, a 133%, a 175%, and a 200%. Also, it makes it so Quick Study multiplies instead of adds to the study rate, because that just makes more sense to me. This is integrated with my [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2976384929]Children Can Learn Fast[/url] mod, which adds learning rate factors to the study genes.
[url=https://discord.gg/fYP8qkcNDh]Discord link[/url] for those who want an easier way to ask questions, make requests, or just chat. I'll also be posting new releases there.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/alite/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Easy link to all of my Rimworld mods[/url]
[url=https://github.com/KonradHeinser/MoreStudyGenes][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url] [url=https://ko-fi.com/alite56114][img]https://i.imgur.com/Utx6OIH.png[/img][/url]
